reviews.sentence: This is a Mariot category 4 hotel. December 2014 stay. This hotel needs serious remodeling. The room was like a motel 6 room and the bathroom needs serious repair rust and molds. The service is also not up to par to other Mariot properties. I am very surprised this is a Courtyard property. I switched to the Sheraton next door after one night no kidding. The Sheraton was recently remodeled and at same price.

Rooms Need Remodeling Otherwise Quite Nice. The property with the exception of the room interior is quite nice. I hope a guestroom refurbishing is planned. The exterior looks newly painted and rerofed and the lobby large gift shop and dining areas a quite nice. My room had carpet stains surprisingly unattractive bathroom and sink areas and worst of all the beds were very sagy I tried both queen beds they are BeautyRest by Simons Hospitality. Wifi in the room was really slow 1mpbs and in the lobby area it was sometimes 2mbps. That was unacceptable five years ago Mariot. The pool areas and patio furniture were fine and parking was free and plentiful. Location is great and my room rate of less than a hundred per night gives this property a 3 instead of a 25.
Great place. we had a great stay excellent price great service.

Easy Check in. Our check in for our one night last minute stay was pleasant and easy. Plenty of parking for various entries into the building room location. Complimentary coffee in the lobby in the morning. Nice market store however felt that the prices were twice the price when comparing the exact same t shirt to one available at a rest stop along the turnpike. Complimentary Internet was painfully slow unfortunately. Pillows were too hard for a good nights sleep for me. Window A C was a bit noisy. A couple nice looking pool areas but we did not use them. The price was right and the location was perfect for our reason to be in the Orlando area. We generally enjoy staying at Mariot properties.
Nice room for the price. Just a pass through stop. Older hotel with adequate upkeep. Room was ok and did not have the musty smell some older hotels in the area have. Great for the price.
Decent price convenient to disney.

Close to the highway this is a decent place for your family to lodge in the Orlando area that is very accessible to the parks and family friendly restaurants nearby. It meets the standards of a typical Courtyard by Mariot in service and room expectations. There is a reasonably priced food service and a decent size gift shop within the hotel.

I came for business and the hotel is fairly decent. I stayed here because of the proximity to customers and the price due to summer availability. Besides the friendly staff you get what you pay for. I travel very often and this room is very very dated. There were bleach stains throughout the hallway and the bathrooms were not in the best condition. I am going to another hotel for the remainder of my stay for the next 2 days that I am here.
Clean Comfortable Friendly staff. Good hotel with reasonable rates good location pretty outside.
The hotel was clean and close to Disney. I enjoyed the staff and they allowed me to check in early when traveling over night at no extra charge. Check out was easy and stress free.

Pleasant. Good location friendly bar staff done helpful front counter staff. A lying very aggressive and confrontational front counter manager sapphire not the impression you want to give in front of customers. Completely different from other front counter staff when finding a Cockroach in room 2nd floor room. dealt with very professionally. Having used this hotel many times in the past. This manager and the car parking charges will make me start to look elsewhere in the area where there many hotels equally or better priced offering better customer service and free breakfast.

My 2nd and last stay here. In 2016 I stayed here for some days with my girl. We stayed on the ground floor with the view of the parking lot. The room was pretty big for 2 but 2 things bothered me. first that it is a noisy hotel you literally can hear every single person in the corridor and everything people of the next room are talking. That was bad but as I sleep easily not the case of my girl that was not a big issue for me. Second the view of the parking lot on the ground floor is not what you are looking for. Anyways. Good points parking was free of charge the hotel receives online purchases clean hotel. This month we were back and the most important point for our decision was that this place is able to get my online purchases. Well this time we got a 2 double bedroom room with a view of the pool. Nicer view than the first time in 2016 but again very very noisy hotel corridor the room next and now the pool. If you have problems with this issue do not go to this hotel. they are able to get your deliveries upon the tax of 10 dollars each bad. Now the parking is not free of charge anymore. 10 dollars night bad againThe building itself seems to have received improvements but my room this time was pretty smaller than the 1st time. But even so very noisy. And last but not least the mattress and pillow are very bad. For that price I am convinced I can get more pleasant and less noisy hotels. it is not a bad place but I can assure you you can find a better place. I definitely will not stay here a 3rd time Goods. next to Disney parks free transfer to Disney parks I do not know the conditions please confirm clean hotel good food and room service. good bathrom Bads far from Universal and International Drive noisy hotel parking fees 10 dollars per package delivered horrible mattress and pillow.

The door was jammed upon arrival. The bathtub was clogged most of our trip. And we found stains everywhere. It was also never listed that they charge parking per night here. Would have been great to know.

Across from Disney at a very good price. Older but clean and safe. Recently visited and continued to enjoy the accommodations but was disappointed to discover you are now charged a fee to park your car. Whoever came up with this idea is not much of a business person. That just makes customers mad. If you need the exta 10 a nite just raise your room rate and tell everyone parking is free.

Most Friendly Hoteliers. Acesible Location. This is a well located motor lodge type hotel with the most friendly staff starting at Check in with David parking with Tores and then Checkout with Ruby. Although might feel a bit dated outside look beyond that for the friendliness super accessible location huge parking and inside rooms remodeling. Issues are taken care of immediately. The one less star is because charging 14 daily for self parking with such a huge surrounding parking and the type of hotel makes you mad. Still look at the overall Value.

The girl at the front desk could n’t tell me why I was being charged more than the price that was advertised on Expedia. just kept stating “ extra fees ”. I found out myself it was for parking which was n’t openly advertised online. so know you will be charged extra for parking. There was a loud mechanical noise outside our room and the walls are paper thin could hear every movement of the people next to us. We were just staying one night so I was looking for an inexpensive room close to Disney but if I had known about the extra fees I would have to pay I would have chosen an overall nicer place for the same price.

The hotel was in a really nice area close to dining but far enough away from all the tourist traps that it was quiet and felt a bit more peaceful. The room was clean and comfortable. The amenities were okay. I did n’t like having to pay 14 to park my own car overnight there that seems a little ridiculous. There was no free breakfast breakfast was also 14 per person. I enjoyed our stay but did n’t like al the extra costs of staying there.

no restaurant between hours of 2 5pm. food extremely slow and over priced. Room condition not good. bedroom door did not close because of the bed in the way. wall air conditioning units extremely noisy and smelly.

I should have requested statement at check out but agreed to have it emailed to me. When I received the statement it had a 995 charge for Data Service which we never requested or used. I sent note to Mariot and one of their folks responded and promised to call me to discuss my concerns. I have called twice and left message but have not received call back in last five days.
